languages.text: "Активностью врагов Человечества. В их числе — культ Последнего восхода. В мое отсутствие ситуация в Просторе Коронус изменилась — я получил исчерпывающий отчет от моих людей, согласно которому ересь пустила корни в регионе, где расположены миры фон Валанциус. Вероятно, вам уже известно о судьбе {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g} Кьява Гамма. Если же нет, то я посвящу вас в известные мне нюансы, но не здесь. Лучше — уже на борту, подальше от случайных ушей".

traits.locale_text: "Активностью врагов человечества. В их числе — Культ последнего восхода. В мое отсутствие ситуация в Просторе Коронус изменилась — я получил исчерпывающий отчет от моих людей, согласно которому ересь пустила корни в регионе, где расположены миры фон Валанциус. Вероятно, вам уже известно о судьбе индустриального мира Кьява Гамма. Если же нет, то я посвящу вас в известные мне нюансы, но не здесь. Лучше — уже на борту, подальше от случайных ушей".

languages.text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."
languages.original_text: "Активностью врагов Человечества. В их числе — культ Последнего восхода. В мое отсутствие ситуация в Просторе Коронус изменилась — я получил исчерпывающий отчет от моих людей, согласно которому ересь пустила корни в регионе, где расположены миры фон Валанциус. Вероятно, вам уже известно о судьбе {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриального мира{/g} Кьява Гамма. Если же нет, то я посвящу вас в известные мне нюансы, но не здесь. Лучше — уже на борту, подальше от случайных ушей".

traits.locale_text: "The cause is the activity of humanity's enemies. And among them — the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed — I have received an exhaustive report from my associates, according to which this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. Furthermore, the information about a xenos invasion is supported by numerous accounts and reports from all corners of the Expanse — this threat must not be underestimated."

"The cause is the activity of humanity's enemies. And among them — the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed — I have received an exhaustive report from my associates, according to which this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. Furthermore, the information about a xenos invasion is supported by numerous accounts and reports from all corners of the Expanse — this threat must not be underestimated."

"The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. You probably already know about the fate of the industrial world of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

"The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

languages.text: 「最後の夜明け教団を含む、人類の敵の活動が活発化しているからだ。自分の不在中にコロヌス・エクスパンスの状況が変化した。エージェントから詳細な報告を受けたが…この異端はフォン・ヴァランシウスの惑星がある地域に根を下ろしている。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}キアヴァ・ガンマがどのような結末をたどったのかはご存じのはず。知らされていない場合は詳細をお伝えするが、場所を移した方が良さそうだ。詳しい話は他の者に聞かれないように、乗船してからのほうがいいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: 「最後の夜明け教団を含む、人類の敵の活動が活発化しているからだ。自分の不在中にコロヌス・エクスパンスの状況が変化した。エージェントから詳細な報告を受けたが…この異端はフォン・ヴァランシウスの惑星がある地域に根を下ろしている。{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}キアヴァ・ガンマがどのような結末をたどったのかはご存じのはず。知らされていない場合は詳細をお伝えするが、場所を移した方が良さそうだ。詳しい話は他の者に聞かれないように、乗船してからのほうがいいでしょう」

languages.text: “原因是人类之敌的活动，‘终末黎明’邪教也在其中。我不在的这段期间，科罗努斯扩区的情况发生了变化。我从我的特工那里收到了一份详尽的报告。报告显示，这群异端分子已经在冯·瓦兰修斯的世界中扎下了根。或许你已经知道{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星落得了怎样的下场。如果你还不清楚，那我愿意将我知道的一切据实以告，不过这些话不能在这里说。最好能在船上谈谈，这样就不会被别人听到了。”
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: “原因是人类之敌的活动，‘终末黎明’邪教也在其中。我不在的这段期间，科罗努斯扩区的情况发生了变化。我从我的特工那里收到了一份详尽的报告。报告显示，这群异端分子已经在冯·瓦兰修斯的世界中扎下了根。或许你已经知道{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}基亚瓦伽马星落得了怎样的下场。如果你还不清楚，那我愿意将我知道的一切据实以告，不过这些话不能在这里说。最好能在船上谈谈，这样就不会被别人听到了。”

languages.text: «La causa es la actividad de los enemigos de la Humanidad, entre ellos el Culto del Amanecer Final. En mi ausencia, la situación en la Extensión de Koronus ha cambiado. He recibido un informe exhaustivo de mis agentes; la herejía se ha arraigado en la región en la que se encuentran los mundos de los von Valancius. Seguro que ya conoce el destino del {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma. De lo contrario, le contaré los detalles que conozco, pero no en este lugar. Será mejor que hablemos a bordo, donde no haya oídos curiosos».
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: «La causa es la actividad de los enemigos de la Humanidad, entre ellos el Culto del Amanecer Final. En mi ausencia, la situación en la Extensión de Koronus ha cambiado. He recibido un informe exhaustivo de mis agentes; la herejía se ha arraigado en la región en la que se encuentran los mundos de los von Valancius. Seguro que ya conoce el destino del {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma. De lo contrario, le contaré los detalles que conozco, pero no en este lugar. Será mejor que hablemos a bordo, donde no haya oídos curiosos».

languages.text: « L'activité des ennemis de l'humanité, notamment du Culte de l'Aube finale. En mon absence, la situation dans les Étendues de Koronus a changé. J'ai reçu un rapport complet de mes agents : cette hérésie a pris racine dans la région des mondes von Valancius. Vous savez sans doute déjà ce qui est arrivé au {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma. Si ce n'est pas le cas, je vous dirai tout ce que je sais à ce sujet, mais pas ici. Je préfère que nous parlions à bord, où personne ne pourra épier notre conversation. »
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: « L'activité des ennemis de l'humanité, notamment du Culte de l'Aube finale. En mon absence, la situation dans les Étendues de Koronus a changé. J'ai reçu un rapport complet de mes agents : cette hérésie a pris racine dans la région des mondes von Valancius. Vous savez sans doute déjà ce qui est arrivé au {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma. Si ce n'est pas le cas, je vous dirai tout ce que je sais à ce sujet, mais pas ici. Je préfère que nous parlions à bord, où personne ne pourra épier notre conversation. »

languages.text: "Die Ursache ist die Aktivität der Feinde der Menschheit, darunter des Kults der letzten Dämmerung. In meiner Abwesenheit hat sich die Lage in der Koronus-Ausdehnung verändert. Ich habe einen umfassenden Bericht von meinen Agenten erhalten – diese Ketzerei hat ihre Wurzeln in der Region geschlagen, in der die Welten derer von Valancius liegen. Ihr habt vielleicht schon von dem Schicksal der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma gehört. Falls nicht, werde ich Euch mitteilen, was ich weiß, aber nicht hier. Wir können an Bord reden, wo uns niemand belauscht."
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ursache ist die Aktivität der Feinde der Menschheit, darunter des Kults der letzten Dämmerung. In meiner Abwesenheit hat sich die Lage in der Koronus-Ausdehnung verändert. Ich habe einen umfassenden Bericht von meinen Agenten erhalten – diese Ketzerei hat ihre Wurzeln in der Region geschlagen, in der die Welten derer von Valancius liegen. Ihr habt vielleicht schon von dem Schicksal der {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma gehört. Falls nicht, werde ich Euch mitteilen, was ich weiß, aber nicht hier. Wir können an Bord reden, wo uns niemand belauscht."

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın da dâhil olduğu İnsanlığın düşmanlarının faaliyetlerinden. Yokluğumda Koronus Enginliği'nde durumlar değişmiş. Adamlarımdan kapsamlı bir rapor aldım. Kâfirlik, von Valancius dünyalarının bulunduğu bölgelerde kök salmış. {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama'nın kaderinden haberdarsındır. Değilsen ayrıntıları paylaşırım ancak burada olmaz. Gemide konuşalım, orada kimse bize kulak misafiri olmaz."
languages.original_text: "The cause is the activity of Humanity's enemies, including the Cult of the Final Dawn. In my absence, the situation in the Koronus Expanse has changed. I have received an exhaustive report from my agents — this heresy has taken root in the region where the von Valancius worlds lie. You probably already know about the fate of the {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} of Kiava Gamma. If not, then I will share what details I know, but not here. Better to talk on board, where we will not be overheard."

traits.locale_text: "Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın da dâhil olduğu İnsanlığın düşmanlarının faaliyetleri yüzünden. Ben yokken Koronus Enginliği'nde durumlar değişti. Adamlarımdan kapsamlı bir rapor aldım. Kâfirlik, von Valancius dünyalarının bulunduğu bölgelerde kök salmış. Kiava Gama'nın {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünya{/g}nın kaderinden haberdarsındır. Değilsen seninle detayları daha sonra paylaşırım, burada olmaz. Gemide konuşalım, orada başkalar bizi duyamaz."
